text: Ani jya divasi allaha ya sarvanna ekatra karila (ani pharmavila) he jinna-samuha! Tumhi manavampaiki bahutekanna atmasata kele ani manavampaiki tyance mitra mhanatila, he amacya palanakartya! Amhala apasata labha pohacava ani amhi tujhya nirdharita velesa, ji tu amacyasathi niscita keli, ja'una pohocalo. (Allaha) pharmavila, ki tumaci jaga jahannamamadhye ahe, jyata tumhi sadaiva rahala, parantu allaha icchila, nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta hikamatasali, jnani ahe
